sub_title: Global Marketing Performance Data Executive at HP
summary:
Customer-focused, ambitious and result-driven sales executive with several years of proven success in optimizing territory and channel revenues through sales, marketing, and service excellence.
Develops comprehensive knowledge of products, competitors, and markets to guide strategy, optimize revenue, and satisfy sales goals. Builds immediate rapport with clients and service teams, and sustains positive, results-driven communications to produce long-term partnerships with sustainable revenue growth. Continuously leverages strengths in analytics, leadership, and creative problem solving to identify new opportunities, expand customer base, deepen existing relationships, and satisfy corporate objectives.

projects.title: Plantronics Partner Program 2018 - BeneNord
projects.description:
Helping to roll out the Plantronics Partner Program in The Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, and the Nordic countries. 

Whether you want to sell, service or build with Plantronics products, solutions and services – in our global partner ecosystem there is a place for various levels of expertise and types of business models. The program is built around three levels of partnership: Registered, Gold and Platinum and four core-benefit programs*: University, Rewards, Marketing Development Funds and Deal Registration.

contributors.headline: Global Marketing Performance Data Executive at HP

projects.title: Plantronics Partner Connect Program
projects.description: Helping to roll out the Plantronics Connect Program in The Netherlands, Belgium and Nordics Partners are demanding improved online training from vendors. Plantronics is delivering with Connect University – a world class online Learning Management System (LMS) that offers professionally developed training curriculums, sales specializations and partner certifications. This program is designed to enable partners to better understand industry trends and solution selling techniques that will drive sales.

• Experience with Salesforce.com and Marketing automation platform Marketo

profile_positions.title: Channel Inside Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
Working as part of our Inside Sales team to provide outbound business development activities to Resellers in the Benelux Region.

•  Account management of 100 accounts
•  Identify opportunities to grow business via telephone contact and new product trails
•  Create leads and opportunities for field sales and customer facing partners
•  Providing inbound support and outbound follow up to enquires generated by marketing campaigns
•  Work closely with channel partners to help close business
•  Focus on identifying new business opportunities from existing and prospective or competitive 
    accounts as well retaining a high renewal rate through up-selling and cross selling

profile_positions.description:
• Provides staff with PCs set up according to company requirement in the most efficient way, including administration of existing PCs and set up of new PCs.
• Develops and maintains standards and procedures regarding use and maintenance of PC’s including software and peripheral equipment
• Solves problems and escalates them when necessary (either reported by users and management via SPOC) or discovered during preventative maintenance, in a proper and timely manner 
• Responsible for proper server administration (creation of logins, mailboxes, setting NTFS permissions, monitoring event logs & daily checks
• Supporting for areas such as cabling, patching and basic telephony support.
• Responsible for incident analysis, identification, registration and resolution. Provides incident updates. Escalates internally or externally if necessary and provides available workarounds.
• AD Administration – responsible for adds, deletes, moves and other changes of all users of the Customer Support Centre.

ensuring the quality preparation of all menu items and proper handling/storage of all food items in accordance with standards
